title: Design team of One Show pencil winning Typophile Film Fest 4 interviewed on Unzipped
content: In case anyone missed it, I interviewed Brent Barson, Eric Gillett and Cole Nielsen on [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232952/http:/www.fontshop.be/) about the [Typophile Film Fest 4 credits](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232952/http:/typophile.com/node/45002).
author: Bald Condensed
